name: sign_escrow_holder_provisions_days
title: Within how many days after Escrow Holder Provisions and Instructions are delivered will they be signed and returned?
label: Escrow Sign Days
description: This can be no more than 5 days.
tips: Prompt signing and return of escrow instructions helps keep the transaction on schedule. Typical turnaround time is within 5 days.
small_print: These documents are usually pretty straight foreward and the default days for review should be enough time. However, feel free to ask for more time, if you feel that you will need it or would like to engage a professional to read through all documents.
